channel.title: My PI server [open source] [Updates October 05, 2013]
channel.description:
This server probably wont be anything special i feel like i could make it a bit better than what it was.
Note: please do not download this if you have a problem with incomplete work. I will say what is done and what is not.
Also, i love feedback so please drop a comment. [code] [b] Updates October 05, 2013[/b] Updated packaging - http://postimg.org/image/x8nf44fep/ Currently "re-coding" the packetHandler because it was stuck into the client class(all of it, yah). just no. Working on Woodcutting The data folder was whiped out so im working on that soon [/code]
[b]Some server details[/b] Uses CycleEventHandler This is an economy server for those who care Has a BUNCH of shit in there, all of which is probably useless atm
[b]Client details[/b] Im using the "Project Insanity Client 525 Look-a-like" client cus i like it old styled characters and items + maps + objects Has a bug. havent looked into it yet
[b]Skills [/b] Woodcutting(incomplete) http://pastebin.com/P6R7YzgP
the rest have not even been started.
[b]Minigames[/b] None.
[b]Download links[/b] Server: http://up.ht/1adJGPr
Client: http://up.ht/1adJM9D
Both: http://up.ht/1adJVtR
[b] [/b]

item.description:

so far it’s looking pretty good… nice job

be sure to take into account the axe your using (for the delay)

item.title: My PI server [open source] [Updates October 05, 2013]
item.dc:creator: @chazion chazion
item.description:
@chazion wrote:

This server probably wont be anything special i feel like i could make it a bit better than what it was.

Note: please do not download this if you have a problem with incomplete work. I will say what is done and what is not.

Also, i love feedback so please drop a comment.

[b] Updates October 05, 2013[/b]
Updated packaging - http://postimg.org/image/x8nf44fep/
Currently "re-coding" the packetHandler because it was stuck into the client class(all of it, yah). just no.
Working on Woodcutting
The data folder was whiped out so im working on that soon

Some server details
Uses CycleEventHandler
This is an economy server for those who care
Has a BUNCH of shit in there, all of which is probably useless atm

Client details
Im using the “Project Insanity Client 525 Look-a-like” client cus i like it
old styled characters and items + maps + objects
Has a bug. havent looked into it yet

Skills
Woodcutting(incomplete) http://pastebin.com/P6R7YzgP

the rest have not even been started.

Minigames
None.

Download links
Server: http://up.ht/1adJGPr
